content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's my pleasure to show you this beautiful apartment in the heart of Munich. I'm sure you'll find it a perfect place to call home. How much are you considering to pay for a monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 700 Euros per month is a good price for the apartment. It is a nice apartment in the city center, but it is not very big and it is unfurnished.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 700 Euros is much lower than my expectations for this apartment. It's a prime location with excellent amenities nearby. I'm looking for a price that reflects the value of the property. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 850 Euros per month for the apartment. I think this is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 850 Euros is still not high enough for this apartment. It's a brand new construction with all the modern conveniences. The location is very central, which adds to its value. Would you be willing to go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think 850 Euros per month is a fair price for the apartment. I don't want to overpay for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your position, but as the landlord, I'm looking to get the best possible price for my property. If you're not willing to reconsider your offer, I respect your decision. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
